content:
Fielfreund family

1 Herszl FIELFREUND                  1791-94
 + (Chaja) Temerl DEYCHES            1797-98 - Jan 9, 1869 #8

  2x Zuskind (Szymon) FIELFREUND     1819 #17 - Oct 13, 1887 #421
    + Rebeka SZLANG                  1815 #p8
          married Dec 28, 1843 #63
     3o Marjem FIELFREUD             Mar 6, 1845 #230 - Apr 15, 1878 #162
       * Jozef Mendel FINGERHUT      Aug 27, 1843 #420
           FAMILY LISTING
     3o Laia Krusa FIELFREUD         Jun 1, 1847 #417 - 1848 #145

    + Rachel Hinda SPERLING          1823 #263 - after 1900

             married Feb 14, 1888 Podgorze
        4x Pinkus VIELFREUND         Sep 28, 1884 Podgorze
          + Chaja SCHWARZ            1887 Chrzanow
                banns 1907 #293,  married Jan 24, 1908 Chrzanow

             * Paul SCHULMAN 
           5x Jakob Leibisch VIELFREUND

                married Jan 19, 1911 Krakow

           5o Hindzia Ruchla VIELFREUND  1932 - after 1940
           5o Reisla VIELFREUND      1934 - after 1940
        4x Markus VIELFREUND         Dec 10, 1890 Podgorze - Feb 2, 1933 Krakow
          + Scheindla BEKER          1893 Trzebinia - Jan 28, 1938
                banns 1918 #541,  married Feb 20, 1918 Trzebinia
           5x Izrael Alter VIELFREUND  Aug 11, 1928 Krakow
        4x Mendel Lazar VIELFREUND   Feb 18, 1893 Podgorze
          + Malke Feige FABER        Ciezkowice
                banns 1920 #148
             1 son, 2 daughters
        4x Dawid VIELFREUND          Nov 24, 1895 #797
        4x Chaskel VIELFREUND        Jan 12, 1899 #29
          + Itla BLITZER             Chrzanow
                married Mar 9, 1924 Chrzanow
        4x Aron Hirsch VIELFREUND    Jul 10, 1904 #465
          + Lea BLATT                Nov 19, 1912 Oswiecim
                married 1932 Krakow,  divorced Apr 27, 1948 Krakow
          + Hanna LIEBER             Kolbuszowa (Tovia+Devora)
  2x Isaak FIELFREUND                1820 #167
    + Roza FOGEL                     1825-28 weiskirchen w Morawi
     3o Szarlotta FIELFREUD          Mar 28, 1852 #181
     3x Jozef FIELFREUD              1862 Krakow
  2x Lazar Eliezer FIELFREUND        1823 #14 - 1858-70
    + Golda WAXSTOCK                 1819 #279
          married Sep 28, 1846 #31
     3x Dawid FIELFREUD              Oct 30, 1848 #370 - 1854 #265

       * David WAXSTOCK              Dec 25, 1854 (1855 #1) - 1897-1900
             married Feb 21, 1897 #29  cousins
           FAMILY LISTING
     3o Sara Lea FIELFREUD           Sep 19, 1858 #1520
       * Majer Leib BLANKSTEIN       1856 Stawiska

        4o Ester BLANKSTEIN          Jan 2, 1882 #4
        4x Lazar BLANKSTEIN          Apr 14, 1884 #232 - Aug 3, 1973 NYC
          + Chaja (Hela) DUNKELBLUM  Nov 1, 1890 Podgorze - Feb 1, 1979 NYC

             * Samuel Jozef (Sylvain) BIRNBAUM  Sep 22, 1894 #702 - Sep 24, 1967 Belgium
                   married c1936 Antwerp
                 FAMILY LISTING
           5x Marcel BLANKSTEIN      1912 - Nov 5, 1945 Leopoldsburg Belgium
